analysis.description: AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_contracts/0xffdf17652cca46eb98a214cb3e413c8661241e49.sol#207-224) is declared view but contains assembly code

	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xffdf17652cca46eb98a214cb3e413c8661241e49.sol#447-457)

	- transferable[i] = this.isTransferable(tokenIds[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xffdf17652cca46eb98a214cb3e413c8661241e49.sol#1109-1113)
